citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available for review. A total of 129 adult guinea pigs, weanlings and
offspring were counted during this inspection. There were no records of the number of guinea pigs held, born, or died for
the last 4 months. Failure to maintain records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by identifying losses
by decreased number of guinea pigs born or raised. Licensee must maintain records containing the required information
for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by
November 2, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available for review. A total of 129 adult guinea pigs, weanlings and 
offspring were counted during this inspection. There were no records of the number of guinea pigs held, born, or died for 
the last 4 months. Failure to maintain records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by identifying losses 
by decreased number of guinea pigs born or raised. Licensee must maintain records containing the required information 
for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by 
November 2, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
